data.event: Natural harbors along San Pedro's Paran√° River shores contributed to its early development as a trading hub, and later to its industrial base, and the city is today home to an important port.

event.title: stand out in San Pedro are tourism, since the city is a frequent weekend

data.event: Among the service sector activities that stand out in San Pedro are tourism, since the city is a frequent weekend destination for visitors from Buenos Aires.
